name: Block Mechanics
description:
Controls:

  • Click and drag to rotate view
  • WASD to move around
  • Scroll with mouse wheel to Zoom
  • Click to place and destroy blocks
  • Click and Hold on a block to select it to rotate it, or it if is a control block to connect it to another block to control

This is a demo of a game I am working on  for Android & iOS. Use blocks to build contraptions to solve physics puzzles.

Directions: Build a contraption out of blocks to get the green goal blocks to goal box.

Follow the game developement on Twitter

Planned Features:

- Player made level saving and sharing.

- Android and iOS

- Move, rotate, and resize blocks

- Motor block

- Logic blocks to control motor blocks

- Wind/Rain to power your contraptions

Added Motors and Control Blocks!
